Methods in com.aliyun.odps.mapred that return JobConf

Methods in com.aliyun.odps.mapred with parameters of type JobConf
 void Partitioner.configure(JobConf job)

static RunningJob JobClient.runJob(JobConf job)
          阻塞（同步）方式提交MapReduce作业并等待作业结束，作业成功则返回作业运行时的对象 RunningJob.
static RunningJob JobClient.runJob(JobConf job, Pipeline pipeline)
          阻塞（同步）方式提交Pipeline作业并等待作业结束，作业成功则返回作业运行时的对象 RunningJob.
static RunningJob JobClient.submitJob(JobConf job)
          非阻塞（异步）方式提交MapReduce作业后立即返回，作业提交成功即返回作业运行时对象 RunningJob.
